item.title: Transport v1.1.10.41
item.description:
Product: Transport v1.1.10.41
Company: Levylab
Release Date: Wed, 16 Oct 2019 11:34:12 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: VIs for scripting and performing transport measurments.

[Control Experiment.lvclass]
Control Experiment.vi provides a uniform way to record information about your sample & device, how the lockin is connected to the device, configures the Krohn Hite amplifier (and Pickering switch if you have one), and sets the base path for saving data.

[SweepControl.lvclass]
Sweep Control.vi: Sequencer for stepping multiple parameters. Calls VIs in Transport.lvclass
Continuous B sweep.vi: For sweeping B continuously while asynchronously calling VIs in Transport.lvclass

[Transport.lvclass]
Basic transport measurments.
- Lockin vs Vsg (or Vbg) (Lockin_Vsg.vi)
- Lockin vs Time (Lockin_time.vi)
- Lockin Sweep Mode (Lockin_sweep.vi (under development)
- IV curves (IV.vi)

Release Notes: [1.1.10.41]
- add APIs to read *experiment*.json descriptor files

Lockin_Vsg
- Fix issue where initial wait time would not be set properly
- Update front panel controls for Experiment Folder and Experiment when called as subVI of Sweep Control

Lockin_Sweep
- Modify to support newest Lockin sweep mode (sweeps multiple channels)

Continuous B Sweep.vi
- Fix issue where notifier was not added to data cluster

Control Experiment.lvclass
- Add accessor Read Experiment Description.vi
item.dc:creator: Levylab

item.title: Lockin-Multichannel v2.8.2.6
item.description:
Product: Lockin-Multichannel v2.8.2.6
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Tue, 15 Oct 2019 21:51:55 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Multichannel lockin for NI DSA (4431,4461, 4462) DAQ cards. This version is configured to handle 1, 2, 3, or 4 cards for simultaneous, synchronized AI/AO. Can also be used as a virtual lockin in simulation mode.

Release Notes: [2.8.2.6]
- Fix bug that would not set initial AO properly
- First version with exe and installer built automatically after VI package
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: FileUtilities v1.2.3.9
item.description:
Product: FileUtilities v1.2.3.9
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Tue, 30 Apr 2019 16:55:48 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Utilities for working with files and folders

* DirExists-NoThenCreate.vi
* Checks if a directory exists, if not one is created
* Format number_123.vi
* takes a number and appends zeros to make 3 digits long (1 becomes 001, 25 becomes 025, 531 remains 531.)
* Format number_123456.vi
* takes a number and appends zeros to make 6 digits long (1 becomes 000001, 25 becomes 000025, 531 becomes 000531, etc)
* Format number_1234567890.vi
* same idea as previous but has a control for how many digits to add
* Ignore Hidden Files.vi
* Removes hidden files (.hidden) from an array of files names
* increment filename.vi
* If file.0.txt already exists change the path to file.1.txt, etc.

Release Notes: [1.2.3.9]
- update icons
- add LICENSE
- add README
item.dc:creator: LevyLab
